root.name: Keepsake
root.description: StoryAfter years of saving up, Lydia's finally on her way to the Dragonvale School of Magic. As orientation rolls around, she can't wait to see Celeste, her childhood friend, again and begin her training. Yet, something is very wrong: the school is completely abandoned. The eerily quiet corridors and rooms hold the answers, but can she solve the puzzles and mysteries in time to save her friend?
